Example

```{r}
new_mean <- function(x){
	n <- length(x)
	mean_val <- sum(x)/n
	return(mean_val)
}
new_mean(x=c(100,200,300))
```

Exercise 2.4: Calculate squares

```{r}
sqr <- function(z){
	sqr_val <- z^2
	return(sqr_val)
}
sqr(z=c(100,9899))
```

*Exercise: Add to numbers

```{r}
sum <- function(a,b){
	sum_val <- a+b
	return(sum_val)
}
sum(4,6)
```

Exercise 2.5: raise powers

```{r}
raise <- function(a,power=2){
	nth_power <- a^power
	return(nth_power)
}
raise(1.33, 9)
```
The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
